page.title: 04A TYPICAL DAY (Part 2)
page.content: My highest score is 19000.It is nowhere near Mr. Farm's highest. My favourite afternoon lesson is craft. I like making things out of balsa wood. We made some wooden fish and seals once. During afternoon play I play 'Tiggy on high'. I always have to be on! The last lesson is usually used for finishing off work, but we sometimes watch a film. Once a week I have to go for my cornet lesson with Mr. Watson. My cornet is a Getzen Capri. School finishes at 3.40p.m. I walk round to the bus stop with Paul and Simon. When I get home I have to do my cornet and piano practice. I am practising for my Grade 5 exam. After my tea I go upstairs to watch my television. When the news comes on at six o' clock I play on my computer. My favourite games are "Matchday" and "Pinball Wizard." {continued
